ml_tags: Andre Rene Roussimoff Born in Coulommiers,France May 19th, 1946 to January 28th, 1993 -He was a professional wrestler and is in the WWF Hall of fame. -He is known as the 8th wonder of the world because of his size. -His size was the result of gigantism, a disease caused by excess growth hormones. The condition led to his eventual diagnosis with acromegaly,  a rare endocrine disorder. “I am not supernatural, I am just myself.” He was not buried but his ashes were spread in Ellerbe, North Carolina
